2.「なんで みつからへんのや。| ウチの情報が 間違うてたんか？| いや そんなは: Why did you go to Mitsukara? Was our|information wrong? No, that's not possible.

3.「あらまぁ 精が出ますなぁ。| もしかして 探してはるのは これやろか？: Oh, my God, he's so energetic. Is this what|you're looking for, by any chance?

5.「……ばあちゃん。| やっぱり あの魔物……| 陰果の罪業のこと 知ってたんやね: ... Bubba. I knew it. That demon... You knew|about Yin Gua's crime, didn't you?

Well... I'm also the chieftain of the Yin|group. I can hear about the past disasters|and the dangers of the techniques used by|
|the Yinshu.

7.「秘術についても 調べさせてもろたわ。| まさか オウマが 研究しておったとは: I'd like to look into the magic. I was|surprised to learn that Ouma had studied it,|but I was too late.

8.「ウチが カミハルムイの宿屋で 話を聞いた時| 教えてくれたって よかったやん。: I'm glad you told us about it when we talked|to the innkeepers in Camiharmoui. My own|grandson asked you to do that for him.

9.「……あかん。| お前は あの陽衆の娘に肩入れしとる。| ロクなことにならんのは: .... You're in love with the daughter of the|yang. I know it won't end well.

10.「それに これは お前が 陽衆のヤツらなんかと| 仲良うしてるから 起こったこと: And this is what happens when you're friends|with the yang people.

11.「あのアサヒとつるんで ニコニコしおって。| 陽衆に毒されて 陰衆としての誇りを:
Hanging out with that Asahi, smiling and|laughing. I think you've been poisoned by|the yang and lost your pride as a member of|
|the yin.

13.「私の孫ともあろう者が こんな不始末を| しでかすとは 正直 思っとらんかったわ: Don't you honestly think that my grandson|could have done such a mismanagement? That's|exactly why...

14.「これは そんなフヌけた孫を 野放しにしとった| 私の責任でもある。アサヒごと: It's my fault for letting my grandson be|such a fool. I'll bury the demon with Asahi,|and settle the karma between us.

15.「あかん！| あの子は…… アサヒは ウチが助ける。| どうか その書をウチに…: Oh no! She's... I'll take care of Asahi.|Please give me the book.

16.「話になりまへんな。それに この秘術の書には| 陰果の罪業を倒す方法は 書かれと:
I'm sorry. And although this book of secrets|describes how to defeat the sin karma of|Yin-Kung, it doesn't say anything about|
|helping the original owner of the body.

17.「私の息子…… オウマでも| その方法は 見つけられんかったようやね。| どのみ: My son... Even Ouma couldn't find a way to|do that. Asahi won't be able to help us now|anyway.

18.「ウソやろ……。| ほんなら どないしたら ええねん……。: You're kidding. Then what am I supposed to|do?

19.「身体をのっとられたのが アサヒでよかったわ。| お前は おとなしく 待っとき。: I'm glad it was Asahi who took my body. You|wait here. I'll take care of everything.

21.「シノノメおじちゃん！？| こんな 遠い所まで どないしたん？: Uncle Shinnome! What are you doing so far|away from home?

22.「悲劇は くり返されようとしている。| 陽衆と陰衆は また引き裂かれるのか……。: The tragedy is about to be repeated. Will|the yang and the yin be torn apart again?

24.「ヨイちゃん。よく聞きなさい。| オウマの秘術の研究には 続きがあった。| アイ: Yoi. Listen up. My study of Ouma's mysteries|continues. He's trying to save everything.

25.「どうか 記憶をたどり 夢幻の森に……。: Please, follow your memories to the Forest|of Dreams.

26.「おじちゃん？ シノノメおじちゃん！？| 夢幻の森？ 夢幻の森に 何か あるんや: Uncle? Uncle Shinnome! The Forest of Dreams?|There's something in the Forest of Dreams,|isn't there?

27.「……ひとつ 心あたりがある。夢幻の森の奥の| 北西の方角には 小さなほこらがあ:
... One thing does ring a bell. There's a|small fort in the northwest corner deep in|the Forest of Dreams. , why|
|don't you check it out?

28.「ウチは シノノメおじちゃんを| 家に送ってから すぐに追いかける。| ええね？:
We sent Uncle Shinnome home, and then we|followed him right away. Right? The|northwest corner of the Forest of Dreams,|
|right?

29.「<pc>。合流できて よかった。| ちゃんと ほこらを 見つけられたんやね。: <pc>. I think I found the right|dust field.

30.「やっぱり ここや……。| ウチは 子供の頃 父上に連れられて| この場所に 来: I knew it was here. My father used to take|me to this place when I was a kid.

31.「あの頃は ここがなんのための場所か| わからんかったけど 父上は ここで| 陽: Back then, I didn't know what this place was|for, but my father was here studying secret|arts for the Yang and Yin people.

32.「父上 どんな思いやったんやろう？| 陰衆として しいたげられながら それでも|:
Father, I wonder what he was thinking. Even|though I was being treated as a member of|the underworld, I still held hands with|
|Uncle Shinonome.

33.「おじちゃんに 嫉妬することは なかった？| 悔しくて 真っ黒な気持ちを| 心に: Were you ever jealous of your uncle? Did you|ever have a black heart filled with|regret...?

34.「ウチな……ずっと 考えてたんや。| テンオツ貴人に 未熟な頭領や言われたこと…:
My house... I've been thinking. I keep|thinking about what you said about me being|an immature chieftain. And how Grandma said|
|it was my fault.

35.「吹っ切れたように 見せかけて 表面だけ| 取りつくろって ほんまは ウチ アサ: They made it look like they were over it,|but the truth is that they didn't really|believe in Asahi.

36.「きっと ウチの中にある そんな黒い感情が| 気づかんうちに あふれだして 陰果:
I'm sure those black feelings inside of us|must have overflowed without us realizing|it, and we were taken advantage of by the|
|sin karma of the shadowy fruit.

39.<center>シノノメは すごい！|いつも明るく 誰に対しても 接し方を変えな:
Shinome is amazing! He's always cheerful,|always changing the way he treats everyone.|He treats me, a member of the shadows, as an|
|equal.

40.<center>話していると楽しくて お互いを認め合える。|陰衆としての自分を:
It was fun to talk, and we recognized each|other. I even thought that I was the only|one who looked down on myself as a member of|
|the underworld.

41.<center>シノノメとなら 天地雷鳴士の未来を変えられる。|そんな風に信頼で:
With Shinnome, we can change the future of|Tenchi Raiyouji. Finding a trusted friend|like that... was something that none of the|
|past Yin chieftains had... my own.

42.<center>遠くない未来…… ヨイとアサヒの時代に|陽衆と陰衆が手を取り合う:
In the not-too-distant future... In the time|of Yoi and Asahi, when Yang and Yin join|hands, we will help each other. For now, we|
|just continue our study of the mystic arts.

44.「……せや。| ウチ アサヒといると楽しくて 自然と| アサヒと一緒にいる時間が: ... I enjoy spending time with Asahi, and|naturally I like spending time with him.

45.「確かに ウチの心の中に アサヒへの嫉妬や羨望| そういった感情があるのは 認め: It is true that we have feelings of envy and|jealousy toward Asahi. I admire Asahi for|doing things that I can't do.

46.「せやけど そんなアサヒのこと| 素直に 認めることができた時| ウチ 自分のこ: But when I could honestly admit that about|Asahi, I felt proud of myself.

47.「陽衆と陰衆が 手を取り合うことは| 絶対に 間違いなんかやあらへんって| ウチ: I myself want to prove that it is absolutely|not a mistake for the yang and the yin to|work hand in hand!

49.「せや！ | アサヒを救う 手掛かりを見つけんと。: Yes! We'll find a way to save Asahi.

50.<center>陰果の罪業に 身体をのっとられる段階までいくと|事態の解決は 難:
When the body is taken over by the sinful|works of the yin and yang, the solution to|the problem is not to be found. It is not|
|easy to restore the ego of the original|owner of the body.

Oh, my God! The stripped and stripped Lord|Asahi has returned to his hole in Camoula|and is facing off with Lady Yoyi's|
|grandmother!

61.「アマツカミト チギリカワシ チカラヲモツテ| アサカゼ ユウカゼ フキハラウゴ: Amatsu kamito chigirikawashi chikara wo|motte asakaze yuukaze fukihara ugotoku|svetenotsumi uchiharai tamae!

64.「ふん。| 陰果の罪業とやらも こんなもんかね……: Hmm. So much for the sinful deeds of the|shadowy fruit...

70.「とにかく 今は あの魔物を止めないと……！: Anyway, we have to stop that demon now...!

72.「アサヒ！ アサヒ！！| ウチや ヨイや！| ウチの声が 聞こえてるんやろ？: Asahi! Asahi! It's us! It's us! It's us! You|can hear me, can't you?

74.「……こんなもん なんってこと あ…らへん。| アサヒを 助けるた…めやっ…たら: ... This is nothing. .... I'm trying to help|Asahi... I'm trying... If I... I'll get up|anytime.

75.「アサヒ……。ウチや…で……。| ウ…チのこと もう わからへんの……？: Asahi. Our house and... In... We... Don't|you know about me anymore?

80.「ヨイ。何しとるん。 | ぼさっとしとらんと 今のうちに| 秘術で そいつを 倒: Yo. What are you doing? Don't stand idly|by... use your secret magic to defeat him|while you still can!

81.「せやな。ウチが アサヒのこと信じへんかったら| 誰が アサヒのこと 信じるんや: . If we don't believe in Asahi, who will|believe in Asahi? Thank you, <cs_pchero>.

82.「アマツカミト チギリカワシ チカラヲモツテ| アサカゼ ユウカゼ フキハラウゴ: Amatsu kamito chigirikawashi chikara wo|motte asakaze yuukaze fukihara ugotoku|svetenotsumi uchiharai tamae!

86.「アホちゃうか！| こんな時にまで 人のことばっかり。| 無事やなかったのは あ: You're an idiot! You know, it's times like|this when people say things like... You're|the one who wasn't safe.

88.「これは ウチの弱さが招いたことや。| あんたが 謝ることなんて なんもあらへん: This is because of our weakness. You have|nothing to apologize for.

91.「それなのに 失敗しちゃって| 結局は ヨイちゃんに 助けてもらって……| ヨイ: And yet, I failed, and I ended up getting|help from Yoi... Yoi's still a good girl.

92.「……アホか。| あんたって やっぱり アホがつくほどの| お人好しやわ……。: .... You are such a good-natured guy.

96.「また何か 不始末を起こしたら| すぐ来ますさかい せいぜい おきばりやす。: If you misbehave again, I'll be right back.

103.「これで 一件落着や！| ほっとしたら お腹すいたわー。: That's it! We're all done! I'm so relieved.|I'm hungry.

111.「……せやね。悪い予感がしてたから| いてもたっても おられへんかって| なんか: .... I had a bad feeling about this, and I|didn't want to stand still, so I looked|around for something I could do to help.

112.「さっすが ヨイちゃん。| 願いのチカラで 陰衆の魔物を| やっつけようとしたん: Nice work, Yoi. You tried to defeat the|demons of the underworld with the power of a|wish!

113.「いや……。正確には 願ったことは| ちょっと ちゃうんやけど……。: No, no. Not exactly what I was hoping for.

115.「……秘密や 秘密！！ | そんなん今さら ほじくり返さんでも| ええやん！: ... Secrets, secrets! You don't have to|dredge that up now!

116.「えー。なんでー？ 気になるぅ。| ヨイちゃん 教えて？: Uh. Why? I'm curious. Yo, yo, you wanna tell|me?

118.「……アサヒや。ご飯は まだかのう？: ... A... Is the food ready yet?

119.「はいはーい。お父ちゃーん。| 今 作るから 待っててねー。: Yes. Dad. I'll make it now. Wait.

120.「……<pc>。| あんたも あの花に| ウチが願ったこと 気になる？<yesn: ... Are you curious about what we wished for|that flower?<yesno><close>

124.「ウチな。こんなふうに 思うんや。| もしかして アサヒの願いも| ウチと おん: . This is what I think. Maybe Asahi's wish|was the same as ours.
